projects.title: BattleShip Game
projects.description: A modern, interactive implementation of the classic Battleship naval strategy game built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: Knight Travails
projects.description: A JavaScript implementation that finds the shortest path for a knight on a chessboard using Breadth-First Search (BFS), with an interactive web visualization.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: This is a clean and modern weather application that provides real-time weather information and a 10-day forecast for any location.

projects.title: Simple Todo App
projects.description: This is a simple todo app that allows users to add, remove, and mark tasks as completed.

projects.title: Restaurant Dashboard
projects.description: Odin Restaurant is a modern, responsive website showcasing a Nordic-inspired restaurant. The project demonstrates dynamic content generation with JavaScript modules and Webpack for bundling

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A modular, factory-based Tic-Tac-Toe game built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This version uses IIFE modules, factories, and event delegation

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.description: A modern admin dashboard built with HTML and CSS Grid/Flexbox. This project demonstrates clean layout design and component organization for a user management interface.

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: A modern, responsive movie application that showcases trending movies using React and Tailwind CSS. This application fetches real-time movie data from The Movie Database (TMDB) API

projects.title: Nike Clone
projects.description: A modern and responsive e-commerce website inspired by Nike's official website, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Thinkboard - Todo MERN version
projects.description: Thinkboard is a full-stack note-taking application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). It features user authentication, real-time note creation, editing, and deletion, with a clean and responsive user interface.

projects.title: CV-Builder with React
projects.description: A modern, interactive CV builder built with React and Vite. Create professional resumes with real-time preview, intuitive form inputs, and a clean, responsive design.

projects.title: Shopping Cart
projects.description: A modern React shopping cart application built with React Router v6.30+ featuring data loaders, nested routes, and comprehensive error handling.
